Today in North Yorks, it's a quiet one with 1 ft @ 4s SSW across the board and fresh 17 mph SSW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 2 ft @ 5s ESE and lighter 12 mph ESE winds, offering some workable options at spots like Withernsea and Filey. The day after brings a solid 4 ft @ 6s E with similar winds, making it a better day for surf at various beaches. Best: tomorrow.
